title: Range to Word Conversion
description:
RANGE_TO_WORD converts a REAL value to a WORD value. An input value
of X corresponds to the value of LOW is converted it into an output value
of 0 and an input value X that corresponds to HIGH is converted to an outï¿¾put value of 65535. The X input is limited to the range from LOW to HIGH,
an overfow of the output WORD therefore can not happen.
name: RANGE_TO_WORD

input.name: X
input.description: The input real number that needs to be converted.

input.name: low
input.description: The lower limit for the range.

input.name: high
input.description: The upper limit for the range.

return_value.description: The word representation of the normalized input value.
